author: Ahmed360

text:
About time Deus Ex got another soundtrack in your Best VGM series. I think that you're underestimating the western games, as most of your soundtrack contains tracks from japanese games.
If I' concerned, Deus Ex deserves to have the whole OST in your Best VGM collection, just like Chrono Trigger almost does. That's wishful thinking though, but I hope we'll at least see these pieces in the near future: Versalife, Ending 1, Cathedral conversation.

author: Guren Digo

text: Oh YES!!! It's all coming back now! After Battery Park, New York was next, and it was such an awesome level. Also, introduced something to really shake up the story in the game lol!!! If anyone has not played Deus Ex, PLEASE, BUY IT and enjoy it! It is a very wonderful experience, an it also happens to be my top game of all time. If the music did not convince you (which I love!), just play through the first level and see how much this game grabs you.
